Unless you are rock steady you're going to need a tripod.Aperture only has 2 settings.Focus doesn't work without good lighting. Also, no option for manually focusing - you'll never get a good shot of something on a transparent surface (like a spiderweb or writing on a window or stuff like that because it will just focus on the background).If you try to zoom in and out in video mode, you're going to have a bad time.Uses tons of batteries...it takes 4 AA which weights like a pound and they die so damn fast.Although I don't like how heavy it is, I like the solid construction (low manufacturing tolerances).It really does take nice pictures with outdoor lighting.All said, if I was buying the same price-range and style camera I'd get the Nikon L820; it's the same price, better zoom, higher resolution, more functional, lighter, better video...If I had to price the S2950 on value, I'd say $90-120 max. Fujifilm didn't do their quality control on this one.

Reviews.Title: average buy
Reviews.Author: ericn
Reviews.Content: Bought on sale for $164. Used for 2 vacations to Hawaii and grand tetons. All  pictures [900] developed ,and came out average or better than expected in daylight. Below average indoors and special effects. Usually used on sports mode. No problems, and battery life is good on rechargeable AA.. Recommend as a  starter bridge camera., but shop around if you expect high quality photos.

Reviews.Title: It said used but it looks Pertty New!
Reviews.Author: Black Friday P.
Reviews.Content: Great Everyday camera i love it, great pics! very small and compact which is awesome for me Because i wear around my neck riding my motorcycle...

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Charlene
Reviews.Content: Has held up to expectations. No problems great deal very satisfied. Love the quality and the price was just right.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: Wanda Croan
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with transaction and promptness!  Camera in great condition and arrived undamaged.  Recommend ordering from this vendor.  The camera itself however was a poor choice of mine as it gives very blurry pics even on automatic.  I use my phone camera more than I use this.  Too bad, the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Good solid camera
Reviews.Author: william s.
Reviews.Content: I like it. You can get your hands on this camera. I like to use this camera when taking family still shots. I carry a little nikon on my belt so as to sneak a photo now and then. Five stars says I love it. I not love no camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for lite-weight point & shoot -- perfect for type of photography i do;  great features on it! Would recommend to ot
Reviews.Author: susan miller
Reviews.Content: FinePix 2950 good camera; love the features it has and nice light-weight feel to it.  Great zoom for close-up pictures!Highly recommend to friends if looking for small lightweight point & shoot. Suits my needs perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: MA Student
Reviews.Content: This was a great package and very worth the money paid!  Shipped fast and just what I needed!  Great!  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great canera
Reviews.Author: pk
Reviews.Content: I love the features of this camera and the shipping was well done and fast to arrive. I ordered this because I dropped and broke my last one but this is a great camera that takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: PinkLady
Reviews.Content: Great item. For the price this item is well worth it. Its been over a year and this travels with me everywhere, diaper bag and purse and it has yet to break.

Reviews.Title: Fugi camera
Reviews.Author: Judy Rodgers
Reviews.Content: Love this Camera.  I am still trying to learn how to use it.  There are so many things to learn.

Reviews.Title: A Gift
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift to my son's girlfriend.  She loves it.  She wears the batteries out on it very quickly when she is in town to visit.  They live out of state.  So, it was well worth seeing her happy.  Thank You Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Quality provider
Reviews.Author: KAW
Reviews.Content: I would highly reccomend using this provider, we purchased a refurbished product but it came in a secure box and works wonderful, it was a good Chirstmas present and arrived in good time

Reviews.Title: The best little camera I own
Reviews.Author: Chameelia
Reviews.Content: I am a professional photographer, and have many camera's, including $3,000 ones. But it's not practical to lug them around with me every where I go, not to allow the little ones to play with, so I bought this one. It's small, light weight and has some of the manual settings I love to adjust on my D-SLRs. Unfortunately, there are only 2 F-stop options, and most of the other manual settings are limited. This camera is perfect for kids, or for people who usually use automatic settings and want something nicer than the pocket sized ones wal mart sells, or like in my case, one that's less of a loss if you accidentally drop it in the water taking beach shots of the kids. It's a great value for the money, but you have a need for total control of all your manual setting, this might not be for you.

Reviews.Title: For those getting the turn off/on message...
Reviews.Author: Pilsen Wellness Center
Reviews.Content: This is a good quality camera and has been very useful, that is, until we ran into the common turn on/off error message from this models. We solved this by applying the manufacturer's firmware update available here:[...]

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Maria Edwards
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take reference photos for painting. I am no photographer! For my purposes this camera works well. It is light and easy to learn.

Reviews.Title: Alsome
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I both for my daughter she loves it outstanding pictures moving or not. The only thing you have to buy a memory card but no problem.

Reviews.Title: Faulty flash
Reviews.Author: oct4stfrancis
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera as a Christmas gift, I was so excited.  then the flash stopped working.  I contacted fuji via email and they told me to check the mode and batteries...like I hadn't tried that. Not that they told me which mode to use.  very unhappy and will return it for exchange in hopes that the flash is the only problem...Had to go online for the users manual which was not very helpful.  Wish Fuji would stand behind their product, we'll see I guesswould like to give it a chance, and it was a gift.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera w/Fujinon
Reviews.Author: Corey
Reviews.Content: So far camera working fine.  Just wish an instructional book had come with the camera without us having to buy one.  Also would have been nice at time of purchase was told booklet did NOT come with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Feedback
Reviews.Author: Kendrick Samuel
Reviews.Content: Great for taking pictures (But I prefer all of my pictures be taken in flash with this one)Really exceptional with the HD videos, I am always recording rehearsals and concept choreography projects as a dancer so this bad boy comes in EXTRA handy. Not so big and bulky, great for a startup camera. Can't be used with any double A batteries, must be heavy duty double A or it will die in a matter of 5 minutes of use. (I've experienced it and I hate it) Definitely recommend rechargeable batteries. I need to invest in some myself!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Gary Spiker
Reviews.Content: gift for my mom's birthday.  she loves it. easy to use, she took it to greece with her and it performed beutifuly

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Cole
Reviews.Content: I love my camera - I have had it for awhile now and it takes great pictures!  My only issue is the telescopic button sticks and I have to mess with it from time to time.  Other than that it is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brandi Street
Reviews.Content: It's awesome!!!! We take great pics every weekend and I bought it has a gift for my boyfriend he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jowanza
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother who wanted a point and shoot camera with many megapixles.  This worked great for her, it's very durable and the battery life is awesome.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: The camera is great its is so easy to use love it we bought one for my daughter and she also thinks its easy to use and great the pics come out great

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer by any means but I like this camera for what it does. It takes good, clear photos in auto mode. Really, I needed something similar to my old point and shoot but with a better zoom. This definitely satisfies that requirement. I can't wait to figure out how to use the more advanced features on it!

Reviews.Title: Awsome camera
Reviews.Author: meep
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera. the pics are sharp and clear and has very good manual settings, if you are going to use video, the audio isnt that good, but i use the video for skate videos on youtube and its pretty good, if you want some examples just check our channel and every video clip without fish eye is the fuji film, just look up kook-eye skateboarding on youtube our channel is kook eye and i think you will like the performance

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: David R. Pylman
Reviews.Content: This camera does all it claims to do, it takes  great pics just be sure to learn  navigating the menu, it has a lot features and you don't want to miss any of them. My only complaint is that like any non SLR they fail miserably in the action shot area, if the subject is moving it's only going to be a clear shot about half the time.  Very nice still shots though.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected.
Reviews.Author: Camus
Reviews.Content: East to use.  Have not used the more manually driven features, but the built-in automatic features are straight-forward and produce lovely results.  I had to download the operating manual from the FujiPhoto site, however, as my netbook does not have a drive for the CD roduct package.  A slight hassle, but one becoming more common with the popularity of netbooks and tablets.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14MP
Reviews.Author: JMC
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, amazing zoom both in photo and in video, easy to use, you should buy the kid cleaning, I recommend 100%

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: The camera is among the cameras of its kind, the range is a good opportunity to capture important moments, is robust allowing a long life, the downside is the reeplazo of AA batteries which bothers use, otherwise I'm satisfied with the quality-value

Reviews.Title: Great camera great price
Reviews.Author: navywife85
Reviews.Content: I've had mine for about 5 months now and have used it SEVERAL times. Birthdays, holidays, fun photo sessions. Sometimes it takes a few seconds to focus clearly, but if you've read the manual and or played around with the settings, it's fairly easy to figure out. Works best when there's alot of light or with the flash. I really have no complaints about it. It's an excellent deal and an excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Charlo
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a pretty good camera. Picture quality is good in decent lighting. I think this camera is perfect for beginners.

Reviews.Title: Excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Hector Reinefeld F "hector"
Reviews.Content: Excelente esta cámara que acabo de adquirir, es lo mejor en camara digital que he podido tener el zoom optical es de lo mejor, y la resolución de las fotos es optima nunca pense que era asi de maravillosa y de igual manera los videos son excelentes.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: N2OBS
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!  It's a wonderful camera, love the digital zoom and an easy to use with it's different settings.  I would buy and give them as a wonderful gift!!!  Thanks Amazon Group!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Francisco Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for use at work to make catalogues and also for making a huge 8mts x 4mts road advertisement.  It is working great and I am very happy with it.  Great pictures, small price, great brand.

Reviews.Title: My first, but I like it
Reviews.Author: AmberH4
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR Camera so even though I've had it for about 2 months now I'm still learning new things about it every time I take it out.  It's very easy to figure out, thankfully since the index that comes with it has minimal information in it.  I've used it in nature shots, family get together, animals, and water shots.  All have turned out spectacular!  I would recommend this for an easy to use novice SLR camera user, and I'm sure it works just as well for a mature photographer as well.

Reviews.Title: Luv it!
Reviews.Author: Margiea
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I wanted. Still have tons to learn on "how to use" properly.The zoom is amazing...captures my birds easily.Have taken pix thru storm door, and they were as clear as if outside!Friends helped me choose this camera...they were "dead on" for what I needed.Looking fwd to years of fun w/this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: sferron1 "Sue Ferron"
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas and I love it. Great for the price. It takes fool proof pictures and is lite weight.Have had this a year now and still like it. works great.

Reviews.Title: S2950 Finepix Camera
Reviews.Author: gary1965
Reviews.Content: Good product.Easy to use and so far the results have been good.Would recommend this camera.Waiting to go on trip to reall see how well it performs.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Eddie-MO-CR
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about a year ago and have loved it! It takes great pictures for a point and shoot type camera. If you want to see some pictures that I have taken with it, almost all the wildlife pictures on my blog were taken with this camera. See for yourself: [...]  I definitely recommend this camera for anyone looking for a decent camera that can take great pictures.

Reviews.Title: The Fujifilm finepix s2940
Reviews.Author: Larsonam
Reviews.Content: I got this camera a while ago and I has not disappointed me! It takes amazing photos, has great affects and the battery use is great. The video is pretty good. You can hear a buzzing noise in the background of the video, but it's not too bad. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kristopher
Reviews.Content: This camera is actually pretty neat. It takes some very nice pictures, and i think that the Micro focusing is very nice. Those particular pictures are nice and crisp. Definitely good for an amateur who is just looking to take some decent-quality photos. Only thing I would have to complain about is the fact that the software that comes with it (and also available online) is highly outdated for the Mac OSX. If you're running Lion, you will not be able to use the software, because it's PowerPC based, and includes a version of quicktime written for Panther (which is almost ten years out-dated)! Luckily, the camera hooks up into iPhoto just fine, so there is no problem there. I haven't tried it with ImageCapture, but I don't see why there would be an issue. Anyway, its a great camera. Really glad I bought it :)

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Ionel Neagu
Reviews.Content: i buy this camera about 3 weeks ago,and i can say is a verry good camera,make nice pictures,is a performant camera and i like it.if you want to buy a digital camera buy this camera you don't regret this choise.

Reviews.Title: great camera for great price
Reviews.Author: vater
Reviews.Content: I am not a camera person but I got this one to get a better zoom, more pixels, and other fun features. Although it is bulky the zoom is fantastic and it is a great transitional camera from little pt and shoot to DSLR. I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cameras
Reviews.Author: Alias
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, my second Fujifilm camera, the first being the S6000. Trouble with the S2950 is that it's probably just a matter of time before the battery door breaks off (very cheaply made). The lens cap falls off easily (not a big deal), but  the worst thing is that the owner's manual is a pdf file. I always like having a manual in my camera bag in case I need to find something quick while away from the computer. The pdf file is 141 pages, too large to print and keep in the bag. Fujifilm could have spent a couple of dollars more on the battery door, the lens cap, and a usable manual and they could raise the price of the camera a couple of dollars to cover it all and then it would be a perfect package.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Paradiso
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. The photos are very high quality and the camera has many great features as well. The zoom is especially useful. The photos came out very clear even on the 18x zoom setting. Very easy to operate and fairly light weight. Though it takes four batteries it lasts quite a long time.The cons are the size, studio USB cord. As far as the size, it's rather large so I have a hard time carrying it around in my handbag without leaving removing some items.Where the studio it came is good, I had troubles installing it at first. I ended up having to re-install it due to issues with opening the studio.The USB cord is pretty short as well. It's the right length but just barely reaches out beyond my hard drive. I have to set the camera on my hard drive or floor rather than on my desk.But overall it's handy camera and very easy to use. Great for amateurs/beginners or hobby-photographers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Content: really what i was expecting. great camera at a great price!. I receive the item on time. I twould totally recommend buying this bridge camera. It's awesome :)

Reviews.Content: Very nice camera and great price. looks very nice and the picture is amazing too for the price. this is goin to be a great christmas gift for my wife

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 18x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD

Reviews.Content: The Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 18x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD has really pretty design, solid construction. Has a lot of features and the quality of the pictures and videos are really great for the price. Really good deal. Thank You...

Reviews.Title: wellpleased
Reviews.Author: dennis taylor
Reviews.Content: good item,worked well for  a first time user.  EASY TO USE, WILL BUY AGAIN IF NEEDED . Battery last long.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, and a Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to this from a little kodak point and shoot digital camera.  I wanted to step into the world of digital SLR's, but I didn't have the funding for that yet.  So, I looked into one of these.  It's everything I was looking for, at a better than expected price.  It takes some really nice shots, especially if you get to learn the settings a bit.  I haven't discovered any downsides to this camera yet.  I can't wait to take this on one of my hikes!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Ellinj
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and have taken many beautiful pictures with it!  Definitely a great camera for someone with beginner/intermediate skills.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: nel
Reviews.Content: the camera is great not too fancy but it gets the job done, definitely worth it and useful to have

Reviews.Title: Horrible picture and video quality. But lots of features. Sort of.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this one. The quality is horrible. Wish I could rate it NO stars.I wanted a camera that runs on AA batteries and has an optical (or electronic) viewfinder. So when on vacation in bright sunny places and my batteries die, I can run into any store, buy standard AA's, pop them in, and use the viewfinder to take priceless memories of loved ones I can't see in the glare of the ubiquitous LCD displays.There only seem to be 5 cameras left in the entire point-and-shoot marketplace that have both features. And only 2 of them under $200.The Fuji FinePix S2940 had a lot of promise. But for three little things.1) Picture quality is POOR. My old 2megapixel Fuji takes better looking pictures.2) Video Quality is worse. It may be full 1280 HD. But the quality is horrible. Gritty and grainy. With no image options available at all. My Canon PowerShot takes great videos with numerous options, including macro. And this Fuji sound quality is far worse than the image quality. It too is gritty. There is a constant white noise present which drowns out any dialog unless the subject is shouting. And it frequently crackles like high-pitched thunderstorm.3) The Battery Door is prone to breakage. It is the same lousy design as my 8-year old 2mp Fuji Finepix. And that one broke after only a few months' use. The worse part is, it's not actually the door that will break. It's the flimsy little retention tabs on the camera body itself that break. The door could be replaced (according to Fuji customer service). But when this bugger breaks, you'd have to replace the camera body. Terrible design. I guess they feel built-in obsolescence is a good thing. Makes you buy more frequent replacements.Well, this POS is going back to the store tomorrow. And I'll buy a Canon or Nikon instead. Even if I can't see what I'm doing on bright sunny vacation days.Hopefully camera manufacturers will wake up and start offering more cameras with back-up viewfinders for when you're not vacationing in a dark cave or rainforest.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Results
Reviews.Author: dianeo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because it had a viewfinder.  That was a great feature to have since I was going to travel down the Grand Canyon on the Colorado River.  Unfortunately I had not used the camera enough before the trip to realize on the Automatic settings it was not possible to reduce the ISO setting below 800.  On Manual settings either the shutter speed would not adjust reasonably thus getting blurred pics or the ISO would stay at 800 even though I tried to change it both on Auto and on regular setting. Therefore I have many picture of the Canyon that are washed out without the true color.  I am going to see if there is a way to return the camera for possible exchange or repair.

Reviews.Title: good point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Todd Ward "Todd"
Reviews.Content: I have used film camera since I was 14 and had recently been using digital.  Love the new features.  I have 2 Cannons now.  My wife wanted a simple point and shoot and that is exactly what you get.  I have had this camera 1 month and this is what I found out.  when using the zoom, do not expect the  a crisp shot.  You are going to need a tripod.  When inside using a flash, get within 3 feet and be sure every one or everything is on the same level distance.  Otherwise the person or object in front will be well exposed and everything else will be dark.Outside or in natural lights look great.  Crisp and clean and the sensors do it right.  But again, if you use the zoom lens too far out such as 18X you really need a tripod.In any setting the shutter release has a slight delay so you need to be ready to plan ahead sometimes.It is difficult to use the manual settings.  It takes some time to figure it out such as changing the ISO or shutter speed.Overall it's a good point and shoot but inside flash is weak.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Kimberly In VA
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for over a year and I can tell you it is not worth the money. It is horrible in low light conditions and pictures are grainy during the day. It eats batteries like crazy and image stabilization is a joke. I seldom use this camera anymore because the pictures are horrible. Yes, I know how to take pictures.

Reviews.Title: Video quality is poor.
Reviews.Author: cas6793
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera because we wanted one to take higher quality photos and videos.  The pictures we've taken have been good.  But the video is REALLY BAD.We used this camera to film my granddaughters' dance recital.  The videos are worthless.  I thought that maybe we didn't have the settings right.  But my son, who is a professional photographer and videographer, saw nothing wrong with the settings.  I suppose we will use this camera for stills only.  Another thing (my fault) is the fact that the camera uses 4 AA batteries, which last about one day.  We have another Finepix camera which has a charging base, and I assumed this one would have one, too.  Again, this was my fault. We would never have purchased this camera had we known the video would be so poor.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Catie Beatty
Reviews.Content: I haven't owned the camera very long, so can't give a solid review of its performance, but I do have a warning for possible buyers. I have a tripod (a cheap one) that has fit 4 other cameras, but for some reason does not work with this one. If you are planning to use it on a tripod, I would bring your tripod with you to the store and make sure it fits. Not looking forward to having to shell out more money for a new tripod, but can't use this camera as planned until I do!

Reviews.Title: One of the good cameras .
Reviews.Author: David Khositashvili "dandy"
Reviews.Content: If we will compare with a price which is I payed for this camera , I wish to say that it's perfect camera . Light , lot of settings and operations, easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera for Dummies
Reviews.Author: Tlbaker
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the reviews I hesitated in purchasing this camera. I am so thrilled I did not take them to heart. I love this easy to use yet very professional camera. I Highly recommend this camera. The zoom is just enough for perfect long distance detail. I live on a mountain at 7,000 ft and the pics I have taken are spectacular! Buy this camera , you won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: Krobo
Reviews.Content: The product came in very good working condition and is exactly as is described. Maybe a little too exact as a matter of fact. My only beef is it came without a lens cover being a refurbished camera.

Reviews.Title: excelent camera!
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: i would recomend it. it's an excelent camera my sister loves it! it takes perfect photos, just like a professional!

Reviews.Title: Inferior to my older FinePix camera
Reviews.Author: Camille
Reviews.Content: As soon as I held this camera, I knew something was wrong. I was pleased to find it a bit smaller than the FinePix S5200 I had owned since 2005. But it was lightweight and flimsy: the plastic housing actually seemed to warp slightly under a gentle grip. It felt and looked cheap, right down to the lens cap that didn't lock in place.This camera should certainly be an improvement over my older model. It has image stabilization, more megapixels, greater optical zoom, etc. Cameras have come a long way in six years.But it's just inferior. I took several pictures with both, side-by-side, trying both automatic and semi-manual modes. (The S2950 doesn't offer the manual focus option that the old S5200 offered, so I couldn't compare that.) In every case, the S2950 took a blurrier, grainier picture.I can't account for its lousiness, but I could return the camera, and I did.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Juanita Hand
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It is easy to handle and I was able to take amazing picture immediately. My favorite features are black and white, continuous shooting and shutter adjustment for pictures taken during motion. I can't wait to really learn the special features. I love this camera!

Reviews.Title: not the choice for low light photography
Reviews.Author: camm
Reviews.Content: While this product definitely had some nice features - nice hand grip, good set up of buttons and menus, good macro for close shots......overall picture quality (especially for the file sizes created) was rather poor in indoor low light conditions.  Clarity was definitely lacking and color and shadowing was rather uneven.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: DOROTHY
Reviews.Content: nice camera! im 13 and i love it... the only thing i would say i wish it could take better indoor sport pictures but other wise its a great bridge camera!

Reviews.Title: Didn't work well for me
Reviews.Author: C. Thompson "Smart Mom"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to receive this camera so i could use it for shooting at my son's baseball games. It was a little larger than I wanted (it wouldn't fit in your pocket) but small enough to hold comfortably. I didn't want a DSLR; I wanted something more for amteurs that could take decent action shots. Unfortunately, the quality of the pictures I took were awful - most still shots were blurry/unclear with 'auto' mode. Also, it was so slow capturing the shots, I couldn't take a picture of my pet because she would move before the shot was captured. Finally, one of the main reasons I got this camera was for the burst mode for action photos - not only was it extremely slow, the screen was 'black' while it was shooting so you couldn't even follow the subject. I returned it for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Not dissatisfied, but I'm selling it
Reviews.Author: Tom in Portland
Reviews.Content: I took this camera to Europe for six weeks and now I'm selling it. It's not that I'm dissatisfied, it's just that this camera taught me what I truly wanted in a super-zoom camera. I discovered that I use a camera like this as a video camera as much as a still camera -- maybe more. As a video camera it only shoots 720px HD, and the zoom (which loses focus while filming) isn't useful.As a still camera, it's hard to beat for the money. I especially like the viewfinder: viewfinders are a necessity in bright sunshine. I hardly used the LCD (for shooting) at all.Au revoir, Dear Fuji. You did a great job.

My first and last experience with Fujifilm products.Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 18x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD

Reviews.Content: If you are looking for great quality pictures keep browsing I have taken pictures using my cell phone with better quality. The pixels are ok however the colors are not vivid enough and changing the settings only make things worse. this is one of Fujifilm's worst.

Reviews.Content: excelente precio, muy buena calidad de imagen y color muy intensos, el zoom optivo responde excelente y rapido al mover los comandos,buena optimizacion de la baterias, pude tomar 146 fotos con flash durante una fiesta antes de cambiar las baterias, buena ergonomia para la sujecion con la mano, la estabilizacion de la imagen es buena, todos los controles pueden ser ajustados personalmente excelente producto a bajo costos

Reviews.Title: Average

Reviews.Content: I'm still getting to know the product. But I'd say it's on par with other point & shoot cameras, even in the more advanced settings. The picture quality doesn't thrill me. It's just average. Oh, and I saw it for cheaper at Wal-Mart after I bought it.

Reviews.Title: G
Reviews.Author: FRda
Reviews.Content: Good Product Do explain why you liked or disliked this product. y y y y y y y y y y y

Reviews.Title: Buena Compra
Reviews.Author: Juan Sanchez
Reviews.Content: No me arrepiento de haber comprado esta camara, es bien compacta y funcional, entregada a tiempo y sin ningún inconveniente.Totalmente recomendada

Reviews.Title: Would be good video camera if I was standing next to a waterfall.
Reviews.Author: Femmeone
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera so when I go the the girls next Cheerleading competition, I would have my video in HD  (I currently have an 8 year old Kodak that takes gorgeous photos and videos, but isn't HD).I bought brand new high quality batteries and put them in. I tested the photos first. First I tried Normal on the Auto setting.  Then I tested the Panoramic setting, followed by the video in HD. The macro is fantastic - Took pictures from about a foot away to see the quality of the macro setting.  They looks slightly grainy to me so I put the SDHD card in my laptop to check it out.  Although the photo did come out non-blurry, it was very grainy.I checked the panoramic photo.  The stitching was really good, however, was again grainy.I then checked the video. Ei Yi Yi -- If I wanted to take a video of the oceanside or a waterfall, it would be great.  The background sound is horrible - like rushing water.  When using the telephoto to pull objects closer, it has a distinctive "click click click" noise.The camera is being returned tomorrow... end of story.

Reviews.Title: Smudgy/Cloudy
Reviews.Author: JTMcMom
Reviews.Content: I probably had the defective camera. I had it on auto mode. The images were cloudy/smudgy indoors even with flash. I did not bother to try the rest of the settings. I returned it and bought a different camera. For example, I took photos of flowers in a vase. The flowers were not defined and looked like the colors were scattering (like a smudge).

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Have taken over 1000 pics on it. Easy to work, good quality for the price. Panoramic shots could be bigger.

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera!
Reviews.Author: R. Roslund
Reviews.Content: Please spend the money and get a camera worth something; it is not worth the money! This camera never took a clear picture!!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mockingjay
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I have been into photography for a while but I can not afford a nice DSLR camera, and this seemed like a nice bridge camera to get.  I WAS VERY WRONG. I did read the reviews before purchasing this, and I almost didn't buy it because of the bad reviews, but there were so many good ones I decided to buy it anyway.  I should have listened to the bad reviews. The image quality is HORRIBLE, it is extremely grainy and the colors are extremely off.  The settings are hard to navigate and the camera is not very user friendly. I can not figure out how to change any of my manual settings.  I do NOT reccomend anyone buy this camera unless you want to waste your money.  For those of you who think this camera is great you are clearly very BLIND. I will be returning this camera and saving to buy a nice camera. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT!!!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: Concord79
Reviews.Content: Worst camera I have ever had. Do yourself a favor and don't purchase this product. Just got it at the end of January, 2012, took it on the trip to Spain with me; ended up taking a lot of pics with it, both day and night, not a single picture or more particularly not a single face on any of those pictures is in focus. Buildings, landscapes are fine but faces are all extremely blurry. I am very disappointed with this product, going to return it hopefully for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: waste of money - poor pictures
Reviews.Author: E. Ralph
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very poor pictures so if you are taking pictures of someone you cherish, expect to be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Fuji camera's are good but
Reviews.Author: camera lady
Reviews.Content: i love this camera but when i go to print the pictures out it won't print them out.. ihave two of these i bought one for a gift and i just found out friday dec 23 they won't print nothing out or show them on my printer. so we had to get up at 5am to drive 75 miles to buy a camera for christmas. i'm sending BOTH of them backi have other fuji cameras  and i love them i think there is something wrong when they made these..camera lady

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Not sure what to say--picked this up expecting it to take solid photos (at least better than an entry-level digital camera at half the price) and almost all interior shots are somewhat blurry no matter what the camera mode. The different features are appreciated, but when the camera takes lousy pictures they don't do much to salvage this purchase...

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I JUST RECEIVED THIS ITEM AND NOT EVEN 24 HRS AND THE FLASH STOP WORKING!!!! SO UNHAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: avoid avoid avoid avoid! Garbage...
Reviews.Author: VML
Reviews.Content: Tried video and pics at the grapevine mall's aquarium.  Lousy! ...My friend's cell phone camera took better shots! And better video too...I got lots of grainy videos and pics. The camera could not stay in focus no mater what I did! We have two of these type of camera and both mine and my s.o. camera had the same issues! Grainy out of focus shots and our cell phone cameras were way better!.. I know cameras and believe me this thing is garbage. I will be getting rid of ours ASAP!  low light? Forget it. This camera is not for anyone who is serious about qaulity video or stills. And quite frankly I think its closer to a "toy aisle " camera than the real thing. This camera is a "sunny day -good exposure" kind of camera and is worthless for documenting experiences where low light conditions are prevalent.  I suppose this camera would be good for people who want to take an hour to set up the shot. But random photos and conditions outside of ideal lighting,movement and weather do not work well for this piece of crap....It is the 1980s huyundai of digital cameras

Reviews.Title: Absolutely terrible camera
Reviews.Author: Matthew Markivee "Matt Markivee"
Reviews.Content: I am a professional photographer. I purchased this camera for my mother thinking she would enjoy the extra features that it came with. I wish I had known ahead of time that this camera simply does NOT do what it says it does. I give this item two stars for quick shipping and price. When I get my money back I'll let you know.I spent three hours playing with this camera and getting to know its features only to find that it has very limited and pathetic features. The quality of the photos doesn't go up when altered. Literally, each setting produced the same quality photo; all of them very low. There was so much noise (and remember, I do this for a living with multiple professional DSLRs. I'm not just blowing smoke here.) that the photo was impossible to use. It's shutter speed alterations did not correctly change shutter speed (At 125 shutter speed I was getting incredibly dark photos with f/3.6 and a 1600 ISO. Ridiculous.) The lens had severe light aberrations in normal sunlight, and while I'm on the topic, the lens zoom didn't adhere to the chosen frame setting. (At a selected 16:9, zooming cropped the screen quality. Why in God's name would it do that!?) The manual ability would have been great if it...well it just wasn't great. 14MP is hardly high quality when it's 14MP of low quality, poorly lit, blurred photos. I am returning this product immediately.At the end of it all I can really only remind you that you're getting what you pay for. Cameras cannot be bought for less than $300 and expected to be up to par with your professional grade DLSRs. My advice, do NOT buy this camera. Look instead to the Canon SX40 HS. It costs over twice as much, but remember, the more you pay the better product you're getting. (Don't quote me on that.)

Reviews.Title: still leaning
Reviews.Author: Andy J. Miller
Reviews.Content: had for about a month now takes great photos. May old finepix was 7mp this base the same camera just more MP. Still leading how to make the adjustments and the lay out change some.Only down side is the lens cap is lose and comes off to easy.

Reviews.Title: A Real Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: This was bought as a gift, but I know for a fact that the recipient absolutely loves it, so I think it's safe to recommend :-)

Reviews.Title: This camera SUCKS
Reviews.Author: steve coleman
Reviews.Content: I specifically bought this camera because it was big and had the view finder. When I bought it from best buy the pics i took were ok. When i tried to record video there is this annoying white noise. I contacted fujifilm & they thought it was the zooming in & out issue. I told them NO and sent them a 30second video clip. They came back saying we tested are cameras too and the white noise sound you hear on video mode seems to be a characteristic of the camera. I thought fujifilm was the top of the line but if they're putting out crap like this it a  no brainer why it was on sale.DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!Severely disappointed!!!
